title: What is your best score you remember?
body:
I've got 40 and 0.

Last game I did i got 40 and 7. It's hard to get 40 and 0 again!

replies.body: Everyone on my team got an S rank in one game.
I just had a 25-2 game as full AD jungle garen a couple of days ago lmao
57-3-12. Akali. S2 enemy team was all squishy mages

[This](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2309656196/203456566) was pretty good considering how much blood there was that game.

Lots of games that are like 2/0/20 though that are arguably better.
48-2-19. It was a normal game though, it didn't mean much. Particularly since it was a stomp and my team agreed to try to farm 100 total kills before ending.
I don't remember. When I get a good score, it's because I was just totally in the zone. Like a state of zen in which I am pure focus. I don't recall much of what happens when I play like that.
do i have to remember there are too many games to look through
I rarely focus on scores and more about winning the game :P
0 deaths with 5+ kills for 6 games in a row like 1 year ago
